description: man in black kimono forcibly embracing a young girl in a purple flowered kimono, pinning girl to the floor; tiny man peering through hole in side panel of a bench in URQ; two cats on sill in LRQ; cloud at top with text and text in five area on left half of image
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Forced Love (Shinkai-shima)
